question: Which are the basin countries of the "Lake Chew Bahir"?
explanation: Ethiopia and Kenya form the basin countries of the Lake Chew Bahir. This lake is also known as Lake Istifanos or Lake Stefanie or Lake Chuwaha. This lake is located at the center of the Stephanie Wildlife Sanctuary/Chelbi Wildlife Reserve. This lake forms part of the north-easterly continuation of the Great Rift Valley
